name: Moon's Shovel
description:
Moon's Shovel is a 2D vertical platform game in which the player controls the dwarf named Ni-Mur who aims to explore the mysterious underground towers. To do this, he needs to reach the end of the towers safely and as quickly as possible. Ni-Mur needs his “Moon Shovel” to face the monsters and destroy the earth blocks to find shortcuts in the chaos.

Programmers: Fábio Lamin and Isac Santos

Level Design: Fábio Lamin and Isac Santos.

Game Design: Leandro Campos

Art: Leandro Campos and Mayara Pereira

Audio: Vinícius Pessoa
